Housing: Social worker also provided parents with a paper copy of a list of local hotels per their request.
Food: Social worker provided information about WIC and noted that social worker will make a referral to WIC closer to discharge for assistance with formula.
Financial: Patient screened today for concrete resource eligibility: Patient is eligible and Social Work provided the following resources:  Meal Vouchers: 3. Additional comments:  Family is currently without income and has limited resources to purchase meals while at the hospital
Transportation: Parents are planning to return to Allentown via Greyhound bus later today.
